variants.Description in input context: Resn8 (NM_001061579.4:c.1392C>T) in the USH2A gene is associated with Usher syndrome type II.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEI-118 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced expression of USH2A protein was observed for the variant NM_001061579.4:c.1392C>T.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type USH2A cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was explicitly mentioned in the literature, but a lack of any USH2A protein expression can be considered as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with Dunnett's post-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal USH2A protein expression levels are usually found in healthy individuals.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced or absent USH2A protein expression is considered abnormal.
